name: DIVE // SHIELD
description:
Local multiplayer space ship arena versus fighter.

Keyboard and controller support, however only tested with an Xbox 360 controller and a PS3 controller pretending to be an Xbox 360 controller. Contains bad AI for the lonely hearts, recommended for multiple people.

Probably in development, depends how I'm feeling.

Mac Users:

Annoy me enough and I might get around to it. The .love will work on mac as well if you have love2D downloaded, available at love2d.org.

Linux Users:

Building Love games for Linux is weird, it's easier to just install love2D and use that to open diveshield.love. Use the commands below to get Love2D.

  • sudo add-apt-repository ppa:bartbes/love-stable
  • sudo apt-get update
  • sudo apt-get install love

Sorry for any inconvenience there.

Suggestions/bugs/problems, send to jimmyhdn@gmail.com
